name: metrics_snapct
description: Metrics snapshot for the snapct tile

full_num_retries.description: Number of times we aborted and retried full snapshot download because the peer was too slow

incremental_num_retries.description: Number of times we aborted and retried incremental snapshot download because the peer was too slow

full_bytes_read.description: Number of bytes read so far from the full snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

full_bytes_written.description: Number of bytes written so far from the full snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

full_bytes_total.description: Total size of the full snapshot file. Might change if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

full_download_retries.description: Number of times we retried the full snapshot download because the peer was too slow

incremental_bytes_read.description: Number of bytes read so far from the incremental snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

incremental_bytes_written.description: Number of bytes written so far from the incremental snapshot. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

incremental_bytes_total.description: Total size of the incremental snapshot file. Might change if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

incremental_download_retries.description: Number of times we retried the incremental snapshot download because the peer was too slow

predicted_slot.description: The predicted slot from which replay starts after snapshot loading finishes. Might change if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

gossip_fresh_count.description: Number of fresh gossip peers seen when collecting gossip peers.

gossip_total_count.description: Number of total gossip peers seen when collecting gossip peers.

ssl_alloc_errors.description: Number of SSL allocation errors encountered.
